Sentencas: A detailed mechanistic model for solid oxide electrolyte direct carbon fuel cell (SO-DCFC) is developed while considering the thermo-chemical and electrochemical elementary reactions in both the carbon bed and the SOFC, as well as the mesa-scale transport processes within the carbon bed and the SOFC electrode porous structures.
Titulo: Experimental characterization and elementary reaction modeling of solid oxide electrolyte direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: The model is validated using data from a fixed bed carbon gasification experiment and the SO-DCFC performance testing experiments carried out using different carrier gases and at various temperatures.
Titulo: Experimental characterization and elementary reaction modeling of solid oxide electrolyte direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: The analyzes of the experimental and modeling results indicate the strong influence of the carrier gas on the cell performance.
Titulo: Experimental characterization and elementary reaction modeling of solid oxide electrolyte direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: The coupling between carbon gasification and electrochemical oxidation on the SO-DCFC performance that results in an unusual transition zone in the cell polarization curve was predicted by the model, and analyzed in detail at the elementary reaction level.
Titulo: Experimental characterization and elementary reaction modeling of solid oxide electrolyte direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: We conclude that the carbon bed physical properties such as the bed height, char conversion ratio and fuel utilization, as well as the temperature significantly limit the performance of the SO-DCFC.
Titulo: Experimental characterization and elementary reaction modeling of solid oxide electrolyte direct carbon fuel cell
Experimental characterization and elementary reaction modeling of solid oxide electrolyte direct carbon fuel cell
